DOC.brief_summary: Study purpose is to evaluate treatment outcome and survival in patient with aggressive lymphomas transformed from Follicular Lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: Italian Multicenter Retrospective Observational Study on Transformed Lymphomas
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed transformed Follicular Lymphoma Age > 18 years Histological transformation between January 2002 and December 2014 Availability of data about treatment and outcome Other lymphoma diagnosis
